  limitations under the License.
 ******************************************************************************************************************** */export const hasApplicationName=applicationInfo=>{return!!applicationInfo.name;};export const hasApplicationInfo=applicationInfo=>{return!!applicationInfo.description;};export const hasArchitectureInfo=archInfo=>{return!!(archInfo.description||archInfo.image);};export const hasDiagramInfo=diagramInfo=>{return!!(diagramInfo.description||diagramInfo.image);};export const hasDataflowInfo=dataflowInfo=>{return!!(dataflowInfo.description||dataflowInfo.image);};export const hasAssumptions=assumptions=>{return assumptions.length>0;};export const hasThreats=threatStatementList=>{return threatStatementList.length>0;};export const hasMitigations=mitigations=>{return mitigations.length>0;};export const hasControls=controls=>{return controls.length>0;};export const hasControlProfiles=controlProfiles=>{return controlProfiles.length>0;};export const hasFlow=flow=>{return!!flow.content;};
